name: NEXIUM POWDER FOR SOLUTION FOR INJ/INF 40 MG
treatmentDescriptions: Nexium for iniection and infusion is indicated in adult for:• Gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) in patients with esophagitis and/or severe symptoms of reflux as an alternative to oral therapy when oral intake is not appropriate. • Prevention of rebleeding following therapeutic endoscopy for acute bleeding gastric or duodenal ulcers.Nexium for injection and infusion is indicated in children and adolescents aged 1-18 years for:• Gastric antisecretory treatment when the oral route is not possible, such as:gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) in patients with erosive reflux esophagitis and/or severe symptoms of reflux.
